name: Fed Up Fairytale
description:
Made for Dani's Basement Game Jam 2

You have lived in the land of Fairy Tales for a long, long time.
 The pukingly bright colors, the obnoxious critters, the incessant singing, and dancing has been driving you mad for years. Your anger has been festering. Your restraint fading. No longer can you ignore your emotions.
 Unleash your true feelings upon these innocent creatures and change their happily ever after, into a...

Fed Up Fairytale
